label: Main Wishes
desc: Complete all main storyline quests in Pharloom.

items.label: The Great Citadel
items.description: Ascend through the lands of Pharloom and reach the Citadel at the kingdom's peak. Reach the Citadel.

items.label: The Threadspun Town
items.description: Break the silken curse ensnaring the town of Bellhart. Defeat Widow to free the town of Bellhart.

items.label: Grand Gate
items.description: Awaken the old bells throughout the lands. Journey to the five Bellshrines throughout lower Pharloom and ring them to unlock the Grand Gate

items.label: Silent Halls
items.description: Venture inside the Citadel and confront the veiled bugs. Confront Lace within the Choral Chambers.

items.label: Pharloom’s Crown #1
items.description: Scale the Citadel and confront the one who haunts the lands of Pharloom.

items.label: Pharloom’s Crown #2
items.description: Learn the threefold melody and open the path to the Citadel’s crest.

items.label: Pharloom’s Crown #3
items.description: Rise above the Citadel and confront the one who haunts the land of Pharloom.

items.label: Pale Monarch
items.description: Confront the one who haunts the lands of Pharloom. Defeat Grand Mother Silk.

items.label: Soul Snare
items.description: Scale the Citadel and ensnare its monarch in a deadly trap. Defeat Grand Mother Silk with the Needolin.

items.label: After the Fall
items.description: Discover the fate of Pharloom. Escape the Cradle.

items.label: Awaiting the End
items.description: Confront the caretaker and his family in the Ruined Chapel beside Bone Bottom.

items.label: Beast in the Bells
items.description: Descend into the Bellway and defeat the hostile creature within.

items.label: The Dark Below #1
items.description: In Deep Docks, find a way to descend beneath Pharloom.

items.label: The Dark Below #2
items.description: Find aid in the Deep Docks to access its diving bell and descend beneath Pharloom.

items.label: The Dark Below #3
items.description: Use the diving bell in Deep Docks to descend beneath Pharloom.

items.label: The Dark Below #4
items.description: Reach the source of the black threads within the Abyss.

items.label: Return to Pharloom
items.description: Escape the Abyss.

items.label: Spell Seeker
items.description: Return to the Snail Shamans in the Ruined Chapel beside Bone Bottom.

items.label: The Old Hearts
items.description: Enliven and acquire the old hearts of Pharloom.

items.label: Last Dive
items.description: Dive into the Void and cut Pharloom free.

label: Wayfarer Wishes
desc: Wayfarer Wishes usually involve finding an item or NPC during Hornet's exploration of Pharloom at the request of another NPC. Later in the game, some Wayfarer Wishes will be placed that involve defeating optional bosses.

items.label: The Lost Fleas #1
items.description: Speak to the fleas before starting their rescue.

items.label: The Lost Fleas #2
items.description: Find and save the 5 lost fleas.

items.label: Pinmaster's Oil
items.description: Retrieve pale oil from the Citadel.

items.label: My Missing Courier
items.description: Search for traces of the courier Tipp and track his location.

items.label: My Missing Brother
items.description: Search for traces of the courier Pill and track his location.

items.label: Balm for the Wounded
items.description: Search for traces of the pilgrim Sherma and track his location.

items.label: The Wandering Merchant
items.description: Search for traces of the merchant Jubilana and track her location.

items.label: The Lost Merchant
items.description: Search for traces of the merchant Jubilana and track her location.

items.label: Rite of Rebirth
items.description: Bind the twisted bud.

items.label: Infestation Operation
items.description: Acquire steel spines from Crull and Benjin in Sinner's Road so Yarnaby can remove the parasite.

items.label: Trail's End
items.description: Search for Shakra and her master in Bilewater.

items.label: Final Audience
items.description: Track the second sentinel by their markers left near Songclave.

items.label: Silk and Soul #1
items.description: Meet with the caretaker in Songclave.

items.label: Silk and Soul #2
items.description: Acquire the necessary components to build a powerful trap.

items.label: Fatal Resolve #1
items.description: Travel to Pinstress's home at the far edge of the Blasted Steps and accept her challenge.

items.label: Fatal Resolve #2
items.description: Find Pinstress on the stormward side of Mount Fay and defeat her in battle.

items.label: Pain, Anguish and Misery
items.description: Return to the Citadel's stage, beside the Whispering Vaults.

items.label: Hero's Call
items.description: Seek out the distressed bug near the Blasted Steps Bellway.

items.label: Ecstasy of the End #1
items.description: Speak to Fleamaster Mooshka of Fleatopia.

items.label: Ecstasy of the End #2
items.description: Achieve high score in the Flea Games and become Grand Champion.

label: Gather Wishes
desc: Gather Wishes involve exploring a region of the map (or in the case of the Great Taste of Pharloom wish, the entire map) and finding specific items to turn in to an NPC and complete the wish. Collecting the required items usually does not directly involve killing enemies, with some exceptions.

items.label: Berry Picking #1
items.description: Speak to the druid in Mosshome.

items.label: Berry Picking #2
items.description: Collect 3 mossberries.

items.label: Rite of the Pollip
items.description: Collect Pollip Hearts from the purple flowers of Shellwood.

items.label: Silver Bells
items.description: Collect silver bells in the Bellvein tunnels above and below Bellhart.

items.label: Alchemist's Assistant
items.description: Collect 3 Plasmium Buds in the Lower Wormways.

items.label: Great Taste of Pharloom
items.description: Collect rare delicacies of Pharloom.

items.label: Advanced Alchemy
items.description: Collect Plasmified Blood from infected creatures in the Wormways

label: Hunt Wishes
desc: Hunt Wishes involve killing normal (or occasionally special) enemies in a specific part of the world and collecting items dropped by them to turn in and complete the wish. The only exception to this is the Dark Hearts wish, which does not require Hornet to collect any items and whose enemy is found all across Pharloom.

items.label: Garb of the Pilgrims
items.description: Hunt haunted pilgrims of Pharloom and collect pilgrim shawls from their bodies.

items.label: Flexile Spines
items.description: Hunt Hokers in the far fields and collect spine cores.

items.label: Volatile Flintbeetles
items.description: Track down Flintbeetles in the Marrow and defeat them to collect flintgems. Flintbeetles can be tracked by their stone-sheddings and aromatic dung.

items.label: Crawbug Clearing #1
items.description: Speak to Creige of the Halfway Home in Greymoor.

items.label: Crawbug Clearing #2
items.description: Hunt Crawbugs in Greymoor and collect their ragpelt.

items.label: Roach Guts
items.description: Hunt the Muckroaches of Sinner's Road and collect roach guts from their bodies.

items.label: Fine Pins
items.description: Hunt pin-welding Choirbugs of the Citadel and collect fine pins.

items.label: Cloaks of the Choir
items.description: Hunt cloaked Choirbugs of the Citadel and collect choir cloaks from their bodies.

items.label: Broodfeast
items.description: Use tools to acquire organs of various types so Huntress may feed her brood.

items.label: Runtfeast
items.description: Use tools to acquire organs of various types so Runt may feed.

items.label: Dark Hearts
items.description: Destroy void masses throughout Pharloom.

label: Grand Hunt Wishes
desc: Grand Hunt Wishes are always accepted from a Wishwall, and involve finding and killing a unique boss enemy and claiming a trophy item from them to turn in and complete the wish. They carry a high reward, either yielding a Heavy Rosary Necklace or a Mask Shard.

items.label: The Terrible Tyrant
items.description: Hunt a Skull Tyrant of the Marrow.

items.label: Savage Beastfly
items.description: Track down the savage Beastfly in the Far Fields and defeat it.

items.label: The Wailing Mother
items.description: Track down the wailing creature in the Slab and slay it.

items.label: The Hidden Hunter
items.description: Track the one who stole Gilly's keepsake near the Bellshrine between Deep Docks and Far Fields.

label: Donate Wishes
desc: Contribute shell shards and rosaries to support rebuilding efforts across Pharloom.

items.label: Bone Bottom Repairs
items.description: Donate 200 shell shards.

items.label: A Lifesaving Bridge
items.description: Donate 300 shell shards to aid the building of a bridge.

items.label: Restoration of Bellhart
items.description: Donate 250 rosaries to aid the rebuilding of Bellhart.

items.label: An Icon of Hope
items.description: Donate 400 shell shards to aid the construction of an icon of hope.

items.label: Bellhart's Glory
items.description: Donate 400 rosaries to complete the rebuilding of Bellhart.

items.label: Building Up Songclave
items.description: Donate 300 rosaries to aid the growing Songclave.

items.label: Strengthening Songclave
items.description: Donate rosaries to aid the Songclave's residents.

label: Delivery Wishes
desc: Deliver rare and precious items to recipients across Pharloom.

items.label: Queen's Egg
items.description: Deliver the Queen's Egg to Styx of Sinner's Road.

items.label: Bone Bottom Supplies
items.description: Deliver supplies to the fixer Flick in Bone Bottom.

items.label: Pilgrim's Rest Supplies
items.description: Deliver supplies to Mort in Pilgrim's Rest.

items.label: Songclave Supplies
items.description: Deliver supplies to the Caretaker in Songclave.

items.label: Fleatopia Supplies
items.description: Deliver supplies to the Fleamaster Mooshka in Fleatopia.

items.label: Liquid Lacquer
items.description: Deliver liquid lacquer to the Mask Maker upon Mount Fay.

items.label: Survivor's Camp Supplies
items.description: Deliver supplies to Flick at the Survivor's Camp.

label: Unique Wishes
desc: Rare and singular wishes tied to special figures and events across Pharloom.

items.label: Bugs of Pharloom
items.description: Defeat the many creatures of Pharloom and fill out the Hunter's Journal.

items.label: Fastest in Pharloom #1
items.description: Meet with the Sprintmaster Swift at the furthest border of the Far Fields.

items.label: Fastest in Pharloom #2
items.description: Race Sprintmaster Swift to discover Pharloom's fastest bug.

items.label: Passing of the Age
items.description: We speak the wish of the Master Herald, he who signs an Age's end.

items.label: A Vassal Lost
items.description: Investigate the resting sites marked by Steel Seer Zi to uncover the location of her vassal.
